reviewText: GREAT old movie goes along so well with the other Mr. Belvedere movies. Loved it very funny.
I would also like to see this on DVD....saw it for the first time on TV just a few days ago.  Fun movie!

I loved this movie when I was younger. I thought it was one of the best ones Shirley Temple ever did. I hope it comes out on DVD soon.

I would really love to own a copy.

Clifton Webb is even more witty and clever as he reprises his role as Mr. Belvedere. He supplies many amusing zingers throughout the film, leaving most of the other characters repeatedly non-plused.  The supporting cast is also strong.  I hope this film makes it to DVD at least.  A Blu-ray set of all three Belvedere films, even better.
